game.name: Do No Harm
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 러브크래프트류의 반전이 숨어있는 의사 시뮬레이터입니다. 구식의 의료 시술을 통해 환자를 진단하고 치료하세요. 하지만 조심하세요. 악몽 같은 존재가 매 순간 도사리며 환각과 속임수, 치명적인 결과를 만들어냅니다. 위험한 결정의 연속을 넘어 30일간 생존하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lovecraftian Doctor Simulator. Diagnose patients by analyzing unsettling symptoms and treat them using your Book of Medicine. Make moral choices — decide who to save or kill, discover whom to trust, and unlock multiple endings! Can you endure 30 days of perilous decisions?

reviewHighlights.text: Attempts to be a doctor-themed [i]Papers, Please[/i] combined with an anomaly hunting game, but falls flat at both. The core gameplay loop is getting...
